Xetec Graphix AT Printer Interface  

 

Xetec Super Graphix Utility Disk  

 

 

 

 

The Xetec Graphix AT printer interface is designed to plug into the Atari SIO bus and allow for the connection of standard Centronics interface printers.  It has a set of switches to allow the user to custom configure it to be used with various printers that were very popular at the time during the 1980's.  The interface would still work with most other printers and allow normal printing but had the ability to specifically work with special graphics modes with the dot matrix printer that it would be configured for.

 

Unfortunately the Xetec Graphix Utility Diskette that came with the interface is completely blank, if anyone has a disk that they can either loan to be read and returned or can send an .atr image, please contact the museum:  CLICK HERE
